    • Method Detail

      • getAxisValueInPercentage

        public int getAxisValueInPercentage(float axisValue)
        Given value of axis in percentage. Percentages increases from left/top to right/bottom. If idle (in center) returns 50, if joystick axis is pushed to the left/top edge returns 0 and if it's pushed to the right/bottom returns 100.
        Returns:
        value of axis in percentage.
